response.original_title: And the Stars are the same
response.overview: Eulalia Pedro, a Mayan elder, fled Guatemala as a result of a U.S.- backed civil war in her country more than 25 years ago. In this short documentary, Eulalia reflects on leaving her home, re-settling in Colorado’s San Luís Valley, and the stars that bind her, her children and grandchildren to a faraway home.
response.tagline: A Mayan elder reflects on her migrant story and the skies that tie her to home.
response.title: And the Stars are the same
